example.text: The EPA’s latest proposed rule reinforces the Administration’s rush-to-green agenda while sacrificing the jobs and wallets of Hoosiers across Indiana. It is critical that the EPA reverses these harmful regulations before they go into effect. [[url]]

I am proud that my bipartisan Securing the US Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network Act unanimously passed out of [[user]]. This critical legislation will help make our nation’s organ procurement process more efficient and effective. [[url]] [[url]]

TODAY: House Republicans took the first meaningful step towards securing our southern border by passing HR 2, the Secure the Border Act, and addressing the national security and humanitarian crisis occurring there. [[url]]
